data.title: Language Names in Their Own Language
data.meta_description: Bay Language Academy in Alameda, California
data.text:
The table below shows native names for languages, or autoglottonyms. You can click on the language names that are links to hear how they are pronounced, and on the English names of the languages to find out more about them.
